title: Red Sox deliver early knockout punch with 6-run inning to salvage series with Yankees
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Red Sox “Put up six-spot — feels like a million with Crochet going.
" Carlos Narvaez's home run punctuated Boston's six-run first inning.
(AP Photo/Jim Davis) By Conor Ryan September 14, 2025 3 minutes to read The Red Sox didn’t have a single player cross home plate after the first inning on Sunday night against the Yankees.

title: Mike Vrabel defends Patriots kicker Andy Borregales after another shaky outing vs. Dolphins
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots “You’ve got to have a lot of confidence in him, and I do have a lot of confidence.
It didn't waver.
" Andy Borregales has had an up-and-down showing so far this season with the Patriots.

title: Seth Moulton says he’s received ‘violent threats’ after asking Trump to condemn political violence
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Politics In the wake of Charlie Kirk's death, Moulton called on Trump to condemn political violence.
"Let's be serious about where this violence is coming from," he said on CNN.
Congressman Seth Moulton speaks during a town hall event at Tewksbury High School on June 16, 2025, in Tewksbury.

title: What Antonio Gibson told himself before his 90-yard fourth-quarter touchdown
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Patriots "I was talking to myself before the play, like man, make a play right here AG.

I asked and received" Antonio Gibson broke free for a 90-yard TD Barry Chin/Globe Staff Antonio Gibson smiled and rubbed his face as he was asked about the 90-yard kick return he ran back for a touchdown during the Patriots’ 33-27 win against the Dolphins on Sunday afternoon.
The Patriots were in need of a big play after giving up a 74-yard punt return to Miami on the previous drive.

title: 2025 Emmy Awards: Full list of winners (updating)
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Entertainment Here is a full list of winners and nominees at the 2025 Emmys, updating live after each award.
Tramell Tillman accepts the award for outstanding supporting actor in a drama series for "Severance" during the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards on Sunday at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles.
Chris Pizzello/AP The 2025 Emmy Awards were all about getting the winners announced as quickly as possible.

title: Milton Williams is living up to his hefty contract in first games with Patriots
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots "I just got off the ball, and shoot, we executed when we needed to.
” Milton Williams recorded two sacks and five pressures against the Dolphins.

Barry Chin/The Boston Globe By Conor Ryan September 14, 2025 3 minutes to read With the Patriots in desperate need of playmakers on both sides of the ball this offseason, New England opened up its checkbook to bring in Milton Williams.

title: Man, 27, dies in Lawrence shooting, DA says
author: Audrey Cooney
bullets: Local News No arrests in the fatal shooting had been announced as of Sunday night.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A 27-year-old man was killed in a shooting in Lawrence early Saturday morning, prosecutors announced.

title: Former Patriots QB Mac Jones dominates in first start with 49ers
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots "They said go out there and rip it.
If I do that, then I know what type of player I can be.
” Mac Jones impressed in his first start with the Niners on Sunday.

title: Mike Vrabel said it felt like the Patriots were ‘willing to get into a street fight’ during his first win
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Patriots The Patriots and Dolphins traded blows on special teams and New England ultimately won the battle in Miami.
Mike Vrabel during the Patriots' win over the Dolphins in Week 2.
AP Photo/Lynne Sladky Mike Vrabel’s first win as head coach of the Patriots almost didn’t happen because of shoddy special teams tackling.

title: 2025 Emmy Awards red carpet: See the best fashion from TV’s biggest stars
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Entertainment See photos of the best fashion from the 2025 Emmy Awards red carpet.
Meghann Fahy arrives at the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards on Sunday at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles.
